item.title: ESXi Snapshot Problems: msg.snapshot.error-QUIESCINGERROR
item.description: [caption id=“attachment_4559” align=“alignright” width=“300”] Photo by Sonja Langford[/caption] Just a quick post about something I experienced at a client, with ESXi 6.0 hosts, today: If you have trouble performing VMware snapshots, and see a msg.snapshot.error-QUIESCINGERROR error, check the host time settings and NTP. In this case, snapshots of VMs located on other hosts in the cluster were fine, but once a VM was moved to the new host, snapshot operations failed after an hour or so.
